entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Donnacona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
